channel.title: Help with my barrows
channel.description: ok my barrows is good at first look on my other server u have to dig like in the real rs which is good =] but after u dig and so up to the coffin and serach it nothing happens so ur like ok..... but when u go to climb up the stairs nothing =[ which is bad so if u could help me fix this problem i would give a reward of say 99str and 70def and attack on the server so u can do barrows aswell and feel good that you helped a noob =][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2007, 01:18:56 PM[/size][hr]any one ??????[br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2007, 02:13:53 PM[/size][hr]come on guys some1 must know

item.title: Help with my barrows
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

Search for: /*OBJECT CLICK ONE*/

under any: break;

add: case STAIRCASEIDHERE: teleportToX = X; teleportToY = Y; heightlevel = HEIGHTLEVEL; break;

Replace STAIRCASEIDHERE with the ID of the object (in this case stairs)

X with the x coordinate
Y with the y coordinate
HEIGHTLEVEL with whatever heightlevel you want it to go to.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my barrows
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

Well first of all ur not a noob and 2nd of all u need to look it up in client.java or the other note pads and find it and set an item to recieve when done so and when u click up stairs you need to add the coords of where they lead to.

I do not have the codes but i will try to find u them.

Read full topic
